text: Prudence, ambition and reason had held instinct in check, and they must dictate her luxury of dreams. She began to imagine life at Bracciano, the balls and fetes, the conversation of poets and dilettanti. She visualized the pageantry of the tournament and herself on the ducal dais beside Orsini, placing a chaplet of roses on the brows of some young conqueror in the lists.
